codeSystems.name: ApgarTimingVS
codeSystems.title: APGAR Score Timing
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent standard timings for APGAR assessments.

codeSystems.name: BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassVS
codeSystems.title: Birth and Fetal Death Financial Class
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent birth and fetal death financial class. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassCM.html).

codeSystems.name: BirthAttendantTitlesVS
codeSystems.title: Birth Attendants Titles
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthAttendantTitlesCM.html).

codeSystems.name: BirthDeliveryOccurredVS
codeSystems.title: Birth Delivery Occurred
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent the type of place where birth or delivery occurred.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthDeliveryOccurredCM.html).

codeSystems.name: BirthWeightEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: Birth Weight Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Birth Weight Edit Flags.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthWeightEditFlagsCM.html).

codeSystems.name: DeliveryRoutesVS
codeSystems.title: Delivery Routes
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Delivery Routes. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-DeliveryRoutesCM.html).

codeSystems.name: EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsCM.html).

codeSystems.name: FertilityEnhancingDrugTherapyArtificialInseminationVS
codeSystems.title: Fertility Enhancing Drug Therapy and Artificial Insemination Value Set
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent fertility enhancing drug therapy and artificial insemination.

codeSystems.name: FetalDeathCauseOrConditionVS
codeSystems.title: Fetal Death Cause or Condition
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death cause or condition. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalDeathCauseOrConditionCM.html).

codeSystems.name: FetalDeathTimePointsVS
codeSystems.title: Fetal Death Time Points
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death time points. 

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalDeathTimePointsCM.html).

codeSystems.name: FetalPresentationsVS
codeSystems.title: Fetal Presentations
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. Only these codes are supported for exchange with NCHS.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalPresentationCM.html).

codeSystems.name: FetalPresentationsMaxVS
codeSystems.title: Fetal Presentations - Max
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. It expands on the [FetalPresentationsVS](ValueSet-ValueSet-fetal-presentations.html) by including intensionally all codes for abnormal presentations, 
as suggested by [FHIR-44554](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-44554).

codeSystems.name: FetalRemainsDispositionMethodVS
codeSystems.title: Fetal Remains Disposition Method
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent Fetal Remains Method of Disposition. Fetal Remains Disposition Method Value Set differs from the related VRDR [MethodOfDispositionVS](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/vrdr/ValueSet-vrdr-method-of-disposition-vs.html) since it includes 'Hospital Disposition', but not 'Entombment'.

codeSystems.name: InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthVS
codeSystems.title: Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth. Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthCM.html).

codeSystems.name: InformantRelationshipToMotherVS
codeSystems.title: Informant Relationship to Mother
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent informants relationship to mother.

codeSystems.name: LocationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Location Types
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes used to differentate transfer and birth locations

codeSystems.name: NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesVS
codeSystems.title: Newborn Congenital Anomalies
codeSystems.description:
The valueset contains codes to represent newborn congenital anomalies. Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesCM.html).

codeSystems.name: NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsCM.html).

codeSystems.name: ObstetricProcedureOutcomeVS
codeSystems.title: Obstetric Procedure Outcome
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes that represent the successful or unsuccessful outcome of an obstretric procedure

codeSystems.name: PerformedNotPerformedPlannedVS
codeSystems.title: Performed NotPerformed Planned
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent the status (performed, not performed, planned) of histological placental examinations.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-PerformedNotPerformedPlannedCM.html).

codeSystems.name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
codeSystems.title: Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits.

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-PregnancyReportEditFlagsCM.html).

codeSystems.name: UnitsOfGestationalAgeVS
codeSystems.title: Units of Gestational Age
codeSystems.description:
This valueset contains the set of codes for specifying the units used when recording gestational age (days, weeks.).

Reporting to NCHS is always in units of weeks, but other users of the associated [ObservationGestationalAgeAtDelivery](StructureDefinition-Observation-gestational-age-at-delivery.html) profile may want to record days.

codeSystems.name: CigaretteSmokingBeforeAndDuringPregnancyVS
codeSystems.title: Cigarette Smoking Before and During Pregnancy
codeSystems.description: This valueset contains codes to represent the number of cigarettes smoked in specific periods before and during pregnancy.
